alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 06 at 3:13AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of up to 8 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...Walton, Bay, Gulf, and Franklin County Beaches. * WHEN...For the High Rip Current Risk, through Wednesday morning. For the High Surf Advisory, until 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should stay out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; South Walton
